ygData.subject: Re: Dark Forge Bracer
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I m just upset because I already have red bracers (and a black bp, for that matter)  I really wanted it to be red tinted black, or a darker black than
ygData.messageBody:
Krukhan Garabash wrote:
>
> From: "Krukhan Garabash" <krukhan@...>
>
> hehe...rather confrontational aren't we =)
>
> it's generally safe to reason that all armor of one type will be the same
> color, bronze, steel, rubi, mithril, umbral etc...so it would be *quite* odd
> (and ugly) for darkforge to end up with a black bp and red bracers. though i
> could see if the color/textures varied by race...troll as opposed to
> whatever race your other friend is.
>
> -kg

I'm just upset because I already have red bracers (and a black bp, for
that matter) I really wanted it to be red tinted black, or a darker
black than charred, or something unique.

Xilith
